name: @wbrantley/port-manager
description: A port leasing system for managing unique port allocations across git worktrees

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:alpha: npm version prerelease --preid=alpha && git push && git push --tags

author: Wayne Brantley
